Header.title: Home Renovations meet AI
Header.paragraph: Home Renovations, made simple, made transparent

Why.title: Project Visualization and Planning
Why.text: Leverage advanced AI to visualize projects and plan ahead, ensuring accuracy and client satisfaction.

Why.title: Direct Leads & Client Connection
Why.text: Connect directly with potential clients, expanding your business with quality leads tailored to your skills.

Why.title: Efficient Material Sourcing
Why.text: Access a network of suppliers for the best materials at competitive prices, including sustainable options for eco-conscious projects.

Why.title: Streamlined Project Management
Why.text: Manage your projects seamlessly from one platform, from initial client contact to final walkthrough.

Services.name: Maximize Property Value
Services.text: Utilizing Resia’s innovative tools, professionals can advise homeowners on strategic renovations that boost property value, backed by realistic visualizations and cost estimates, ensuring investments are wisely made.

Services.name: Streamline Renovation Projects
Services.text: Resia simplifies the renovation process with integrated project management tools that connect real estate professionals with vetted contractors and suppliers, ensuring projects are completed efficiently and to client satisfaction.

Services.name: Optimize Flipping Projects
Services.text: Resia transforms flipping projects by enabling professionals to visualize renovations before they begin, providing detailed ROI forecasts based on various renovation scenarios. This ensures informed decision-making and maximizes profitability on each flip.

Services.name: Attract Eco-Conscious Buyers
Services.text: By focusing on sustainable renovation options, Resia helps real estate professionals appeal to a growing demographic of eco-conscious buyers, offering them green choices that align with their values.

Features.title: Visualize
Features.text:
Curious about what that next renovation project is going to look like? 
 With our platform, simply drop in a couple inspiration photos, a few pictures of your existing space and let the magic happen.

Features.title: Estimate
Features.text:
Wondering how much that new kitchen is going to cost? 
When you produce a new project idea, we tell you how much it’ll cost.
 Not only that, we also calculate your predicted ROI, so you know what you get back.

Features.title: Connect
Features.text:
Not sure who to trust?
 Resia connects you with local contractors, with real experience. No more hassling with unknown contractors -- know who you’re working with from the get-go.

Features.title: Track
Features.text:
So, you’ve started your renovation project. But you have no idea what you contractor is up to. 
 That’s why we’ve made a portal so you can track your renovation process, know where your materials are being sourced, and understand what the holdup is.
